## ** Quick Decision:**

**"I want to sync two databases..."**

- **...in the same app?** → `SYNC_TRANSPORT_GUIDE.md` → Section 1 (In-Memory)
- **...in different apps on same device?** → `SYNC_TRANSPORT_GUIDE.md` → Section 2 (Unix Domain Sockets)
- **...on different devices?** → `SYNC_TRANSPORT_GUIDE.md` → Section 3 (TCP)
